The second way to control Internet usage is through the Time Allowance feature, which grants the child a set number of hours per day on the Internet. Once those hours are used up, he’s out of luck until the next day. The time allowances are broken down into Weekdays and Weekends; there is no way (that I know of) to set a day-by-day time allowance. … [Read more...] about Qustodio: Free Parental Control Software For Internet Access [Windows]
